title: I am unable to get my Pixel 2 to connect to my @apple MacBook Pro 2018 (USB C ports).
content:
I have tried both C to C and C to A but my Pixel doesn't show up in Finder nor with adb. I have dev/USB debug enabled. Nothing works. Please help

Edit: I have already tried File Transfer, both downloading the application and setting that on the Pixel.

I have also tried restarting both devices
